entry.title: Is it love or are we just friends with tension?
entry.summary:
Author: Val_in_a_trenchcoat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,464Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 0

Summary: “Eddie,” Buck asks, in the usual tone he has when a stray thought has drifted across his mind that just has to be said aloud. Eddie prepares himself for whatever sentence follows, usually consisting of words that should never, ever be strung together.The last time Buck had taken on that tone of voice, he’d asked Eddie, Would you rather be kidnapped by aliens but you don’t have any legs, or have to fight off a T-Rex but you don’t have any arms? after they’d watched Jurassic Park with Chris.“Have you ever considered sleeping with a guy?”Eddie slowly, carefully, looks up from his bowl of cereal. “What?”   Or: Eddie Diaz and the sexuality crisis he is not having, but Buck thinks he should have. For science!

entry.title: The Beginning of Something I Couldn’t Have Dreamed Of
entry.summary:
Author: tomatosoupforthesoul

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,504Chapters: 2/7Kudos: 21

Summary: "Maybe that’s why he feels more tranquil about it, more open. Because this is Hen, and he knows that she won’t judge him. So, without any real reason and absolutely no lead-in or warning, Eddie breathes in deeply, and turns slightly before the light turns green and…“I think I’m gay.”"Or, Eddie comes out, goes on dates, and finds his happily ever after... that was maybe right in front of him this whole time...

entry.title: like a feather of flames on me
entry.summary:
Author: Val_in_a_trenchcoat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,866Chapters: 14/22Kudos: 168

Summary: Evan – Buck – Buckley is a twenty-eight-year old broke college student recently ripped away from his childhood dream job as a firefighter after a life-shattering accident left him permanently disabled. Living on what’s left of his savings while going to college won’t keep him fed, though… but nobody has to know about his scandalous job on the side with Redline Pleasure Anonymous Call Agency. Eddie Diaz is a recently divorced, thirty-year-old college professor and father to the best kid in the world. In light of his recent split, though, he’s made a discovery: his sexuality might not be as straight and narrow as he’s always thought. Instead of panicking, though, he makes the safe, sensible (and budget-breaking) decision to set a hypothesis and test it by calling in to a sex hotline to talk to a male agent. Everyone experiments in college, right? Even the professors. Enter the mysterious Firehose – the hot voice on the other side of the line that Eddie can’t get out of his head.And Buck might just be getting a little crush on the hot professor he keeps doing silent study sessions with in the college library.What will they do when it all collides? [updates every Thursday]

entry.title: PTA Dad Wars: a dead wife, bi-erasure, and one very real, very tired First Sergeant of a husband
entry.summary:
Author: DamnSterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,728Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 234

Summary: Eds, So I might’ve accidentally joined the Parent Council? They asked for volunteers and somehow everyone stepped back except me? I think I got tricked. And suddenly I’m in a group chat with twelve mothers, a dad named Rick who has no spine, and a principal who types like she’s angry at the keyboard. Anyway, the moms are insane. They keep flirting with me. FLIRTING. I kept saying “I’m married,” and they kept going “oh that’s sweet, but we’ve never seen your wife.” YOUR WIFE??? Babe. I think this is bisexual erasure?? I’m being erased. I’m being doubted in my own bisexual existence. Do you know how insulting it is to have your very real, very hot husband dismissed because they’ve never seen him? I’m offended on behalf of our marriage. You need to come home before I have to bring Christopher as a witness. Miss you. A lot. —B. Ps. Chris is fine. He got an A+ for the science project.

entry.title: stay alive, open wide
entry.summary:
Author: dogfishmonger

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 442,059Chapters: 40/40Kudos: 1,007

Summary: He feels like shit when he's hungry, and he plays better when he's empty. The cold air doesn't touch him as much. The floodlights turn silvery-soft.And he likes eating. Keeps his hands busy, mouth busy, mind busy. Something to chew through, putty in the ears.Go until he can't anymore. Cycle it back out. Be ready. -- OR: Buck's had on-again, off-again bulimia since he was 14. -- Title from Psychic Friend's "We Do Not Belong".

entry.title: Whispers in the Barracks
entry.summary:
Author: MissP20

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,166Chapters: 5/7Kudos: 5

Summary: In a wartime military camp, companions—people of all genders—are stripped of freedom and forced into sexual servitude. Buck arrives as one of them, his defiance quickly crushed by the cruel system. Eddie, a soldier bound by duty, has never questioned the morality of the camp—until Buck awakens something in him: compassion, desire, and a dangerous, forbidden connection. Amid stolen moments and constant danger, their secret bond grows—but in a world built on power and cruelty, love comes at a cost, and survival may demand the ultimate sacrifice.

entry.title: Can I Finally Say I Love You?
entry.summary:
Author: Gaymer_Inc

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,943Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 8

Summary: Buck and Eddie are finally together. It's 2 months since they started dating, and 1 month since they made it official, making it 3 months total (Almost 4? Kind of four?). Eddie isn't ready to come out, not at all. But Buck understands.Of course he does, he's been there himself, and is trying to give Eddie all the time he needs, but it's been 3 months, and it seems like Eddie hasn't even thought about it. He knows not to rush him, but all he wants to do is show the 118 - No; the world - how much he loves Eddie.Yet, most importantly; he's tired of being kept a secret.Maddie knows of the two, and has been sworn to secrecy by Buck.- "You promise not to tell Chim or anyone else?""Promise.""Pinky promise?"Maddie chuckled, "Pinky promise," said as she raised her pinky and locked it with Buck's. -

entry.title: Buck, Ballroom-ed and Bewildered
entry.summary:
Author: eutony_majime

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,178Chapters: 3/13Kudos: 52

Summary: Before the host could continue talking about “Mr. Sexy Fireman” any more, Eddie’s phone buzzed. He looked down, and his stomach clenched. ‘Producer Katy’. “Shit,” Eddie said, grabbing at his phone. “C’mere, you stupid thing.” Finally, he got a grip and answered the phone. “Yo, Katy! Any news yet?” “Yes, actually. I think we got someone for you.” OR Evan “Buck” Buckley, a young firefighter from LAFD 118, soars into fame after his daring rescue of a young woman was filmed and went viral on social media. When a Dancing with the Stars producer walks into the station with an offer, Buck is introduced to the world of ballroom dance. His partner is certainly not who he expects… Eddie Diaz is entering his 4th season of being a pro on Dancing with the Stars with little success with his previous partners. After being eliminated in Week 5 last season, Eddie is ready to finally make it to the finals. So when he gets a note from the producers saying that they found him a partner, Eddie expects a gymnast or a model, or someone like that… not a devastatingly handsome firefighter…

entry.title: First Steps To Are Forever
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,815Chapters: 8/20Kudos: 10

Summary: It wasn’t supposed to be more than friendship—just support, just family, just being there. But somewhere between takeout nights, shared laughter, and long shifts that blurred into dawn, Buck realizes the truth he’s been running from: he’s not orbiting Eddie out of loyalty. He’s falling. Hard. With every small act of care—every folded sweater, every cleaned dish, every stolen glance—Buck feels himself pulled closer to a truth too dangerous to name. Because once he admits what his heart already knows, there’s no going back. Or will he slip away

Summary: Eddie wakes up in an odd place and the last thing he can remember is one of the worst moments of his life. He fought with Buck, in his—their kitchen. It started about Bobby's death, but it quickly spiraled. And Buck said some... a lot. Buck said a lot. Eddie thinks he'll regret that night for the rest of his life. Which, from the looks of it, won't be very long.

entry.title: I know that you'll come if you want
entry.summary:
Author: Elgney

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,635Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 543

Summary: “How did you get home from the hospital?” “Took an uber.” “Does Maddie know?” Silence. “Does anyone?” More silence. More of Buck refusing to meet his gaze, staring at the door like he thought he could entice Eddie to leave by the power of suggestion. Well, good fucking luck, Eddie thought. Wild horses, and all that. “Why didn’t you call anyone?” he demanded. “Why didn’t you call me?” “I did!” Buck snarled. The momentum of his indignation carried him into a sitting position, and Eddie could see him flinch with the pain of it. His unnaturally stoic front was gone, and something raw and wrenching took its place; it occurred to Eddie that he’d never heard Buck raise his voice before. “I did call you, Eddie! As I was bleeding out on my kitchen floor. You. Didn’t. Answer.” --- The squatter in Buck's attic has a knife. Buck has a bit of a breakdown. Eddie has a plan to make everything right.

entry.title: Fault Lines
entry.summary:
Author: themrscevans

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,881Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Ava Rousseau never meant to fall for one firefighter — let alone two. What begins as reluctant friendship deepens into something raw and unshakable: love in the wreckage, trust forged in fire. But fault lines don’t ask permission before they break, and between ER chaos, unspoken confessions, and scars that refuse to fade, Ava learns the fiercest battles aren’t fought in the field — they’re fought inside your own chest.
